text:
My name is Janvi and I'm
the co-founder and CEO of Hue,

which is a shoppable video platform
that brings the power of authentic

shortform video reviews to
e-commerce sites.

Due to the rise of platforms like
TikTok, 88 percent of shoppers search

for videos of people wearing
products before purchasing.

Yet brands' and retailers' e-commerce
sites have not evolved to keep up.

Most websites only have
static model images, and

written reviews, which customers
don't always trust.

Hue solves this problem through
our shoppable video platform,

which embeds directly
on the brand's website,

allowing customers to browse the
Tiktok-like feed of user-generated

video reviews, all while never
leaving the brand's site.

Unlike other solutions on the
market, Hue provides both

the tech platform as well
as the content sourcing

from our diverse community of
over 2,000 vetted micro creators

who are everyday people who
sign up to our platform
to review products.

We've already partnered with
11 brands and retailers, and

have seen very strong results.
The video module is the

number one to two
most-clicked part of the

product page, and led to a
150 to 275 percent increase

in conversion, with customers
typically watching 3 to 4
videos on average.

We've been growing extremely
quickly. In the past 6 months

since we launched, we
quadrupled our revenue.

And we raised over 2 million dollars
last year In our seed round.

So we're really excited about
this traction and growth, and

we hope you join us on our
journey to revolutionize

the e-commerce
shopping experience.
